message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at this price point.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $10,500.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,250?
